name: GRE Hangman
description:
Having trouble finding the right words?  Enter GRE Hangman.  Inspired by all those times you’ve played hangman on the back of a napkin with a sibling or friend.  Except this time, you’ll be the one winning when you know every obscure word in the dictionary.  Side effects of daily play include describing things with a plethora of adjectives people can’t understand and sounding like Shakespeare.

Good luck!

Vocabulary lists and definitions are from Magoosh GRE prep.
